Address: 111 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Country Club Delight
Secluded & private 3 bedroom family home on a 611m2 corner block. Very well presented you will feel right at home as you open the front gate. Greeted by lavish lawns, low maintenance landscaped gardens & an enormous deck as you step up to your new front door. Inside polished floor boards with open plan light filled living. Kitchen has stainless steel appliances including a 4 burner gas cook top, electric oven, dishwasher completed with a stylish glass red splash back. Modern central bathroom with a fantastic deep bath to relax & unwind in. All 3 bedrooms have built in robes & brand new carpet. Freshly painted throughout, only a few months old hot water service & recently serviced gas ducted heating are additional features. Outside is a single carport & garage, plenty of room to kick a footy or entertain your guests on the deck. With everything Clifton Springs has to offer the golf course, bay, boat ramps, beaches, new shops, medical facilities, schools & public transport too. All your wish boxes have been ticked.
Insights: 111 Country Club Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Neat, Sweet & Complete
Located in a superb pocket of Clifton Springs close to all major amenities including schools, shops, transport, parks and the Bay is this neat brick home ready for you to move straight into.
This home will appeal to first home buyers, downsizers and savvy investors alike as there is nothing that needs to be done, the floor coverings are new along with majority of the window furnishings and the established front and back gardens are manicured and well-kept.
Comprising three bedrooms all with ample built-in robes, bathroom with bath and shower, large light filled living area which veers into a reading room/study nook. The kitchen with gas cooking and generous cupboards overlooks the large dining/family room; the laundry and separate toilet complete this free flowing floor plan.
Situated on 603m2 there is plenty of room to run around or improve the already well-kept gardens.
Features of the home include ducted heating, gas cooking, great storage facilities, undercover outdoor area, garden shed and wide side access into the yard with plenty of room for parking.
Don't miss the opportunity to secure a slice of the ever popular Bellarine Peninsula.
Insights: 33 Hill Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Renovaters Dream
I am excited for you! This is an awesome opportunity to secure your piece of the pie in the very popular and ever growing Bellarine Peninsula. 3 bedroom weather board home sits pretty on a 592m2 block. Step up to a private veranda that runs the length of the house. Enter via sliding doors straight into an open plan living & kitchen area with an electric stove. 2nd living area at the front has street & garden views. All 3 bedrooms have built in robes. Central bathroom & laundry completes this package. Outside is a double garage and plenty of yard behind secure gates for kids or pets to roam free. Everything is here, just waiting for your skills to renovate. Plus everything else Clifton Springs has to offer, public transport, local schools, new shops, medical facilities & the bay lifestyle.
Insights: 54 Panpandi Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Build Your Dream Here!
A prime allotment sits on 785m2 (approx.) at the end of a quiet cul de sac lies an opportunity to build your dream coastal property. With the potential to capture incredible views of the bay overlooking the You Yangs and simply sit back, and watch the gentle boating traffic whilst you have your morning coffee.
Located close to all that the Bellarine has to offer, including wineries, beaches, schools and golf courses, this property is also 10 minutes from the Portarlington- Melbourne ferry. Commuting to Melbourne CBD has never been easier. Geelong city is mere 30 mins away which offers plenty of schooling options for families seeking a seachange.
Insights: 8 Wanawong Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Tranquility!
Established gum trees just over the back fence, the wide open spaces of neighbouring parklands, water views from foot, an enviable land holding of 770m2 (approx.) within a quiet cul de sac and an abundance of local birdlife create a truly tranquil one of a kind property.
• This charming residence boasting an open fireplace, Coonara and exposed brick feature walls delivers a warm and welcoming home.
• A well-appointed timber kitchen is spacious and serves up a practical working space with great storage solutions.
• An enviable land holding of approximately 770m2 is further enhanced by parklands right at your back door step; buyers looking for a private and neighbourless 'feel' would be hard pressed to find a better example.
• A lovely entertaining zone is perfectly orientated with a northerly aspect; generous proportions and a custom built pizza oven ensures this property is ideal for those who love to entertain.
• The secure rear yard is fully landscaped and is undoubtedly one of the best in today's local property market; an abundance of established fruit trees, gorgeous miniature tree lined brick pathways, no less than 7 productive built up vegetable patches and a water feature creates a truly tranquil setting.
• A drive through garage and additional off street parking for the boat and/or caravan further endorses that this property is made for the Bellarine lifestyle.
• A second to none location; parklands and various sporting amenities over the back fence, the water edge is only a short walk away, the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp literally just down the road and easy access to all that is great about the Bellarine Peninsula.
• A wonderful home for today and a savvy investment for the future!
Insights: 11 Kirra Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Views To The Left, Views To The Right!
Sitting proudly from one of Clifton Springs' most elevated sites this property boasts commanding panoramic views that have to be seen to be believed!
• This charming 3 bedroom residence is warm and welcoming; polished timber floors, high ceilings with decorative cornices and various corner set feature windows which soak up lovely natural light from the properties northerly aspect.
• Dual balconies provide a lovely space to enjoy an early morning coffee or a late wine as you gaze across the vast deep blue vistas
• A generous main living area and a beautiful light filled sunroom provides a lovely independent living zone
• Are you a green thumb? Then 5X established raised veggie patches (approximately 38m2), 19,000 litre water catchment capacity, 2X pump and watering system ensures you have produce all year around.
• This property has a full federation style main bathroom and cleverly has a separate toilet and powder room at the rear of the home offering convenient access while you are working in the garden or workshop.
• A unique quality of this fine property is its liveability profile; x15 solar panels, a doubled glazed window feature, external shutter blinds and cross ventilation ensureS this property is working for and not against in the efficiency stakes.
• Off street parking, a deep single garage and workshop provide room enough for the car, trailer and/or boat.
• A second to none location; the bus passes right on by your front door, Malcolm Reserve literally just down the road and the wide open spaces of the exclusive small acreage properties just over the back fence.
• A wonderful home for today and an excellent investment in your future! Act today as this real estate will no doubt be 'hot property'.
Insights: 77 Dandarriga Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Live In or Spruce-Up!
Calling all first home buyers and savvy investors - this is the one you've been waiting for! Set at the top of a private court this family home has endless opportunities awaiting our successful buyer.
Let your imagination run wild with this solid brick veneer home comprising 3 bedrooms all flowing from the central hallway; the master with walk-in robe and ensuite, while the 2 remaining bedrooms both with built-in robes. A well-positioned central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry complete the rear of the home.
The kitchen overlooking the dining area equipped with ample cupboards, electric cooking and island bench before flowing into the expansive living area including study nook. This light filled space also enjoys bay views, split system heating and cooling and gas heater.
The HIGHLIGHT of this home is the astounding block size, a whopping 780m2 surrounded by established gardens with plenty of room for additions and improvements, complete with a double lock up garage.
Located in a sought after pocket of Clifton Springs close to public transport, schools and all your major amenities all within proximity to the Bay.
If you want a slice of the Bellarine's best kept secret be sure to have this home at the top of your list!
Insights: 13 Labulla Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Sunny Home In Quiet Court

Central kitchen with electric cooking and double pantry. 3 double bedrooms with built-in robes. 2-way bathroom. Outside is a 10m x 5m covered patio area ideal for summer nights and outdoor entertaining. Established gardens front and rear. Currently tenanted at $320 per week.

Description:
TIMELESS- CLASSIC BEAUTY!
This character home is set across a fantastic allotment of 1170m2 and has oodles of space for the growing family to enjoy. The home offers 3 bedrooms all with robes plus a parents retreat or study that adjoins the master. The family lounge room is generously proportioned and opens to a separate formal dining room with french doors that lead to the outdoor living zone. The kitchen consists of timber cupboards, 900m upright oven, dishwasher and a good sized meals area. Many timeless features give this home a wonderfully warm and inviting appeal- 9' ceilings, bay windows and an open fire place to name but a few. Outside it is all set out for you. Brick paving abounds, blue stone retainer walls, verandahs and an established garden that you could put your own mark on. A large single garage and workshop for the man of the house. A reserve at the rear of the property assures privacy. Property with this much to offer is scarce in the current market so be quick to secure it for yourself.
Insights: 9-11 Gwinganna Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
PANTASTIC OPPORTUNITY - FIRST HOME BUYER/INVESTOR
Look no further for that perfect investment opportunity or ground floor entry for the first home buyer.
Located in the quiet area of Clifton Springs. This property abounds with opportunity, pretty much the blank canvas, something you can put your own stamp on, or rent out for future capital growth. Consisting of three bedrooms, one bathroom, which doubles as an ensuite, a generous laundry. A spacious light filled living area, with adjoining kitchen. This property is ripe for the picking, with a small investment and a creative eye, this property will renovate with ease.
All sitting on a generous 593m2 block. Separate lock up garage to the rear and plenty of space for the boat/van or other bits of kit you need to store. Backing on to a green belt where you can walk the dog or kick the footy.
Again first home buyers/investors an inspection is a must.

Description:
As Good As New
This 40 year old award winning design is the original home before this sought after Wyndham Rise Estate development and subdivision took place. A complete renovation has given new life to this forward thinking design, meaning that this home has the look and feel of a brand new property with the building quality and workmanship seen in the 70's. A formal lounge room and dining area has direct access into the double lock up garage with the main open plan family room and renovated kitchen flowing onto the north facing yard and alfresco entertaining area. The master bedroom has full ensuite and walk in robe with the other 3 bedrooms having a central renovated bathroom. Side access into the yard allows for boat or trailer storage, whilst the position is close to schools and transport. A brilliant position with a fantastic street appeal, this home will not disappoint!!!
Insights: 6 Streeton Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Stunning water views
Panoramic outlook encompassing views of the City of Greater Geelong, The You Yangs, Corio Bay & the City of Melbourne. Imagine life on your new two storey balcony watching the shipping lanes in Corio Bay & the city lights at night.
Set amongst quality homes close to private & public schools with easy access to shopping.
CLifton Springs has a safe boating harbour in Corio Bay offering great catches of King George Whiting, Calamari & Snapper.
One of the greatest secrets getting out is the sandy beaches providing safe swimming & great snorkeling opportunities in the shallow waters.
The Port Phillip Ferry service is creating a buzz for those who work in Melbourne & want to live a lifestyle.
Opportunities for this desirable location are few & far between.
Insights: 30 Panoramic Terrace, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Modern Mecca
Situated on a smart block on the undulating slopes of Clifton Springs with magnificent, panoramic views of Corio Bay and Geelong's night lights. The north-facing aspect fills the modern Hotondo-built home with sunlight. Perfect for weekends away or a new family home on the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula.
The home has separate living zones on each level with the downstairs family room spilling outdoors to a fully enclosed entertaining area complete with pot belly, barbeque area and TV connection. Access to the low maintenance rear yard comes via the laundry or outdoor area. Three generous-sized bedrooms with BIRs and family bathroom are also located downstairs.
On the upper level you are treated to a sweeping panorama from all view points in the living area. Solid timber floors, tinted windows and a free flowing space from kitchen, dining and the indoor/outdoor living space make for ease of family gatherings. The main suite at the rear completes the upstairs and includes hidden walkin robe and spacious ensuite.
Features include solar panels, water tank, double garage with rear access for extra storage, projector to family room, garden shed, solid fuel and gas heating and much more.
Located close to all amenities and public transport and just a short drive to the beaches, cafes and wineries of the Peninsula.
Insights: 26 Seahaven Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Peaceful living in a bayside location
This low maintenance three bedroom brick veneer home is the ideal start to your property dreams. Sitting up proudly on Bayshore Ave, it is located only a short drive to the Clifton Springs Golf Course, boat ramp or primary school. Your only choice will be whether you decide to move straight in or rent it out, as the home has recently been leased at $310 per week.
The property offers a master bedroom with walk in robe, ensuite and bay window, the remaining two bedrooms both have built in robes. There is a separate front lounge and good sized open plan kitchen dining living area. The kitchen has stainless steel appliances and ample storage with an island bench.
Other features include gas heating and evaporative cooling, single remote garage with rear roller door to a paved area and an enclosed large north facing rear yard.
This home is sure to appeal to a wide range of buyers. Call today to book your inspection, or attend any upcoming opens.
Insights: 36 Bayshore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Split Level Splendor
Presented over three split levels this immaculate property will exceed your expectations. The astute design and free flowing floor plan allows for a growing family to have their space inside and out being set upon a generous 722m2. The ground level has been set in a retreat style offering a multitude of options with 2 bedrooms both with built-in robes, main bathroom including bath and shower, separate toilet and large living area including cooling and with access to the yard. The 1st level is home to the master bedroom with walk-in robe and lavish ensuite, study, powder room, European laundry and access to the garage. The top floor is the heart of the home encompassed by town and modest bay view's yet offers a stunning sunset! The open plan kitchen overlooks the dining and second living area with access onto the decked area which includes sturdy café binds. The kitchen is a practical work space equipped with 900mm freestanding gas cooking, dishwasher, pantry and plenty of bench space including a built in buffet for extra storage which doubles as a work desk. The back garden is manicured and low maintenance with plenty of room for the kids to run and play, an additional double garage makes for the ideal man cave or extra storage and the handy side access is fantastic for boats or trailers.
Features of the home include hardwood timber floors and stair cases, ducted heating and split system heating/cooling, ceiling fans, double glazed windows throughout with mirror tint upstairs and across the front windows, good storage, double garage with remote entry + internal/outside access, side access, water tanks and established gardens.
The location of this home completes this ultimate package being in close proximity to the local schools, transport, shopping facilities, the Clifton Springs Gold Club and under 2kms to the beach. Such a unique home with so much to offer will not last long in this thriving market.
Insights: 14 Delungra Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Potential Plus Investment with Modern Apartment
Looking for great investment potential - the vendors are ready to negotiate with a new sale price. As the rapid development of the Drysdale - Clifton Springs area continues a rare opportunity exists to take advantage of the continued growth on the northern Bellarine. Opportunities of this type do not often present themselves in the local marketplace. Downstairs office space of approximately 100m2 is complimented by an upstairs three bedroom, modern apartment including double garage and gallery area. Live in and work downstairs from home. Situated in close proximity to the future by-pass road and the Portarlington ferry service this property has great potential for capital growth and lifestyle alternative. The apartment is currently tenanted on a periodical lease.
The north-west orientation of the property allows for a pleasant outdoor area on the deep-set veranda taking in views across the rooftops to Corio Bay. Inside the open plan living area and kitchen are spacious and comfortable. Central gas heating, reverse cycle air conditioning and modern appliances sit comfortably with the neutral palette of the interior. There are three bedrooms to the rear all with BIRs and ceiling fans. The family bathroom sits central to the bedrooms with spacious laundry and powder room nearby.
Downstairs the modern shop front area has beautiful hardwood flooring, one large office which could be split into multiple workstations and a second single office. As new kitchen facilities are provided at the rear. Features included in this quality build are ample storage space and shelving, reverse cycle air conditioning, as-new oven and dishwasher and disabled toilet facilities.
Ready and waiting for the astute business professional or investor.Call now to inspect.
Insights: 2 other 3 bedroom unit in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A Touch of the Hamptons with Stunning Bay Views
Warm, homely and inviting are just a few words that describe this beautifully presented home. Don't let the façade deceive you, expectations will be exceeded.
Updated with care and quality craftsmanship this home oozes appeal and instills a comforting and relaxing atmosphere. Upon entry you are greeted with warm hardwood floors complimented with a stunning timber cathedral ceiling and a very neutral yet warming palette throughout.
The highlight of the home is the open plan kitchen, meals and 1st living area. This area is light filled during the day offering stunning views across the Bay which you watch for hours out of the comfort of your home or from the wrap around balcony, the wood heater is a lovely touch however a split system has been added for the warmer days. The designer kitchen has been finished with timber benchtops, ceramic in-bench sink, dishwasher, Blanco 900mm gas cooking and an abundance of cupboards which completes the fore of the home.
The 1st & 2nd bedrooms are equipped with built-in robes, character ceilings and ceiling fans, bedroom 3 has a convenient walk-in robe also with a ceiling fan and the lavish master suite can be zoned off and set up as a guest room or parents retreat including a large walk-in robe, ceiling fan, full lavish ensuite and separate living area/ sunroom with access into the back garden. A well fitted out laundry, separate toilet and stunning main bathroom including raised sinks, timber vanities, seamless shower base and free standing bath tub.
The front garden is low maintenance and manicured as is the back garden, the entry to the home is via steps and a private gate which will bring you the a large wrap around balcony where different seating areas have been set up; further down the verandah you will come across a quaint sitting area that will service the parents/guest retreat before entering a gate to the back garden where you will find a cubby/storage room, and a lovely grassed area.
Features of the home include character fittings and fixtures, heating/ cooling, stunning views of the Bay/ You Yangs, stainless steel appliances, approx 5KW solar panels, multiple outdoor areas, private entrance and double lock up garage with remote access.
Located in a sought after pocket of Clifton Springs just moments to the shops and Foreshore, a home not to be missed!
Insights: 7 Coolabah Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Sea Change Lifestyle? This is for you!
Wanting to enjoy a slow paced lifestyle, this is the home for you. On a corner allotment the home lends itself to multiple opportunities. First Home Buyers, Investors, Downsizers this is ticking all the boxes for you. Step inside and be surprised by the high ceilings, ample light and warm feel. Zoned living with 3 bedrooms at the entrance, magnificent central hub, a large living room with a coonara fire, perfect for a winters day with plenty of room for dining and a study nook. You'll be impressed with the large kitchen ideal for cooking up a feast. Completing the home is another rumpus room with space for a pool table or perfect for a parents retreat, and a large Master w/ WIR and ENS. Outside faces north and has a generous entertaining area, plenty of room for planting a veggie garden and a variety of fruit trees. You'll love the side access with room for a caravan, boat or trailer. Additional features include reverse cycle split systems in main living and master bedroom, braemar gas wall furnace and a spa bath in ensuite. All on approx. 594sqm. With views towards the water and walking distance to the Golf Club, seconds to the bay, boat ramp and mins to shops/schools. This is the lifestyle home you've been waiting for. Inspection A Must.

Description:
What a Pearler !
Do not hesitate to organise an inspection of this well-maintained property situated in Clifton Springs. With delightful leafy views framed by the full-sized window from the main living area this delightful home has something different that is worth exploring.
From the very impressive over-sized front door to the cathedral ceiling in the main living zone, polished floor boards, classy light fittings, renovated kitchen and three good sized bedrooms, complete with a fresh paint job and brand new carpets. Evaporative cooling, gas central heating and surround sound are also fitted to this established home.
But wait there is more, outside, the alfresco living area is the biggest deck you could imagine with enclosed spa that is meticulously cared for. This is a fantastic family space all year round. Manicured gardens, a great garden shed in the back yard and additional space behind secure double gates for the boat or trailer.
Public transport metres away makes getting to the local shopping precinct a breeze. Ten minutes to the Portarlington Ferry and Peninsula cafes and wineries this property is not to be missed !
Insights: 41 Dundundra Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
